column2: "Welcome back! I was waiting! Do you have some scenery to show me?"
"...Wow, this is great! So this is somewhere where you have happy memories, huh?"
"I've asked a lot of other people to give me their suggestions, too. If we show them one by one, that should make everyone happy, shouldn't it?"
"If we're careful about the order and how long we stay on each one, it should feel realistic enough. Thanks for your help!"
